name: Brinojja
content:
Brinojja was a Hutt who operated as a crime lord during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The Hutt employed the Trandoshan Verkoss as the chief enforcer for Brinojja's crime operation and in 4 ABY, Brinojja sent Verkoss and a group of thugs to apprehend the Human information merchant Rat from a bar on the moon Nar Shaddaa. A group of Rebel Alliance agents assisted Rat in escaping from Brinojja's thugs and the information broker was subsequently grateful to the Rebels for saving him from the Hutt.
Brinojja was first mentioned in Soulsaber, a 2001 RPGA roleplaying adventure by Lee Pickler and set within Star Wars Legends continuity that served as the second instalment of the Child of Light saga. The Hutt was subsequently referenced in the final adventure of the Child of Light saga, Light and Dark, in 2002. Brinojja's gender is not confirmed in either source.
